longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required.

Visa Issuance:
- Holders of an Entry Authorisation issued by the Burundi
  Immigration can obtain a visa on arrival at Bujumbura (BJM).
Warning:
- Nationals of Uzbekistan are required to hold a biometric
  passport when departing Uzbekistan
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year of age.
Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for children under 1 year
  of age.
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year in the whole country.
  Recommended prevention: C.
